GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: get an article by its id

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

/api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: get all comments for an articl

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Is available on /api/comments/:comment_id. Endpoint accepts an object in the form { inc_votes: 1 } or { inc_votes: -1 } and update the votes on a comment given the comment's comment_id
